allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Rebrand to JOFO - Joy of Financing Out

- New brand identity: JOFO replaces Stash as the app name
- "Stash" retained as action verb within the app
- Added /tonight page with 40+ JOMO activities and AI spending insights
- Added /transfer page with animated money flow simulation
- Added compound growth visualizations with Recharts
- New landing page: "Sacrifice tonight. Stack tomorrow."
- Fixed DialogTitle accessibility for screen readers
- Rebranded "FU-ME" to "Future You" throughout

Tech: Next.js 16, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
